DocTemplateUsage.Name: Document
DocTemplateUsage.Documentation: The documents of the IfcWorkSchedule can be referenced by the IfcRelAssociatesDocuments relationship.

DocTemplateUsage.Name: Control Assignment
DocTemplateUsage.Documentation: An IfcWorkSchedule controls a set of tasks and resources defined through IfcRelAssignsToControl. Additionally, through the IfcWorkControl abstract supertype, the actors creating the schedule can be specified and schedule time information such as start time, finish time, and total float of the schedule can also be specified.

DocTemplateUsage.Name: Nesting
DocTemplateUsage.Documentation: A work schedule can include other work schedules as sub-items through IfcRelNests relationship.

DocTemplateUsage.Name: Aggregation
DocTemplateUsage.Documentation: A work schedule can include other work schedules as sub-items. If not included in another work schedule it might be a part of a work plan (IfcWorkPlan) defined through IfcRelAggregates relationship.
